name: tgs-crew-creator
description: The Crew Creator Application for the Takapuna Grammar School Rowing Club

scripts.unix:init: npm i; cd public; npm i ;cd ..; npm run unix:init:db
scripts.unix:init:db: npm run unix:init:drop-db; cd ./util; rm -rf ./.tmp; echo "setting up db"; echo "compiling"; tsc ./initSchema.ts --outDir ./.tmp --experimentalDecorators --emitDecoratorMetadata;echo "running"; node ./.tmp/util/initSchema.js; rm -rf ./.tmp
scripts.unix:init:drop-db: mysql -u root -e "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS HUDSON_CURREN_TGS_CREW_CREATOR; CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS HUDSON_CURREN_TGS_CREW_CREATOR;"
scripts.win:init: npm i && cd public && npm i && cd .. && npm run win:init:db
scripts.win:init:db: npm run win:init:drop-db && cd .\util && rmdir .\.tmp && echo "Setting Up DB" && echo "COMPILING" && tsc .\initSchema.ts --outDir .\.tmp --experimentalDecorators --emitDecoratorMetadata && echo "running" && node .\.tmp\util\initSchema.js && rmdir .\.tmp
scripts.win:init:drop-db: mysql -u root -e "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS HUDSON_CURREN_TGS_CREW_CREATOR; CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS HUDSON_CURREN_TGS_CREW_CREATOR;"

author: Hudson Curren <hudson.curren@icloud.com>
